Description_lang: The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking $217694o1 Fire damage over $217694d, and then exploding to deal an additional $44461s2 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to all other enemies within $44461A2 yds.Other enemies hit by this explosion also become a Living Bomb, but this effect cannot spread further.
AuraDescription_lang: Causes $w1 Fire damage every $t1 sec. After $d, the target explodes, causing $w2 Fire damage to the target and all other enemies within $44461A2 yards$?$w3>0[, and spreading Living Bomb][].
